title: Publish the current version to production

requirements.text: Publish the currently built version of the application to the production environment with no additional feature or UI changes.
acceptanceCriteria: A production deployment is triggered for the current codebase.
The production site loads successfully and reflects the latest deployed version.
No functional or UI regressions are introduced as part of the publish step.

constraints: Do not introduce new product features or UI changes as part of this request.
Respect existing single-actor Motoko backend architecture (no new canisters/services).
Do not edit files under frontend/immutablePaths (compose instead if changes were required; none are requested here).
nonGoals: Refactoring frontend components or backend code.
Changing content, styling, animations, or media upload behavior.
Adding analytics, authentication changes, or any third-party integrations.
